work.occupation: Criminal organizer and mastermind, president and owner of legitimate businesses
work.base: A penthouse in New York City; formerly Fisk Tower in New York City, a mansion in Westchester County, Las Vegas.

connections.groupAffiliation: Leader of The Hand, leader of a coalition of East Coast non-Maggia criminal organizations; former director of Las Vegas HYDRA faction.
connections.relatives: Anatoly Fyskov (ancestor); Vanessa Fisk (wife, deceased); Rose (Richard Fisk) (son, deceased);
